title: Prismacolor Col-Erase Erasable Colored Pencils, 24 Pack
description: Make any paper craft project look visually appealing with the Prismacolor Col-Erase colored pencils. Kids can mix and match vibrant colors to create unique finished art. They can use these prismacolor colored pencils to bring their illustrations to life. These erasable colored pencils have built-in erasers that allow children to make changes while doodling. This pack includes 24 assorted coloring pencils.
